title: Bootstrap Display Utilities
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## Showing and Hiding
Control the `display` property.

### Format
`.d-{value}` or `.d-{breakpoint}-{value}`.

### Hiding Responsively
* `d-none`: Hide always.
* `d-none d-md-block`: Hide on Mobile, Show (Block) on Tablet+.
* `d-block d-md-none`: Show on Mobile, Hide on Tablet+.

### Values
`block`, `inline`, `inline-block`, `flex`, `grid`, `table`...

examples.explanation: d-grid is shortcut for display: grid.

interview_questions.question: How to hide an element on print only?

real_world_use_cases.description: Sidebar is `d-none d-lg-block` (Hidden on mobile, permanent on desktop).

summary: Display utilities are the primary mechanic for creating responsive behaviors.
